name: Bondage Net
descrip: ¡Atrapan a tu enemigo con una gran red de cuerdas mágicas para atarme!No debe estar en una postura.
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] arroja una gran red a [TargetYouOrMonsterName] que rápidamente los ata de manera pervertida, ¡dejándolos inmovilizados!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] throws a large net at [TargetYouOrMonsterName], but [TargetHeOrShe] deftly avoids it.
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles against the tightly binding ropes...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] squirms against the tightly binding ropes...
restraintEscaped: And breaks free, shredding the ropes in the process!
restraintEscapedFail: But stays snug in the pleasant bondage of the ropes!
